title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Intensive Workshop for Strategic Teaching Assistant Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational support experience and knowledge related to language instruction
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants can apply three or more strategic teaching methods (e.g., questioning techniques, time management strategies) to actual classroom instruction.
Participants can enhance learner engagement by over 20% by utilizing effective feedback techniques (verbal/non-verbal).
Participants can design and share instructional materials using two or more digital educational tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
